com.trackplus.dao

Interface LocalizedResourcesDAO


  • public interface LocalizedResourcesDAO
    DAO for LocalizedResources

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delete(java.lang.Integer resourceID)
      Deletes a localizedResourcesBean from the database
      void deleteAllForLocale(java.lang.String localeStr)
      Deletes all resources for a locale
      void deleteLocalizedResourcesForFieldName(java.lang.String fieldName)
      Deletes the Tlocalizedresource for a fieldName for all locales

      Deletes the Tlocalizedresource for like a fieldName, and key for all locales
